buttonShape: Shape Projects and Community With Your Tokens
collapsibleContent: As a Contract-based organization inside the DeepBlue economic ecosystem, 100% of the economic rights of every AI project in THE4 are encoded into its Contract tokens. Anyone holding those tokens becomes a co-owner of that project's future cash flow and governance. At the community layer, THE4 is organized as a Covenant: its community token represents the collective rights and responsibilities of all participants. Holders of the Covenant token can propose and vote on governance matters that shape the direction of THE4.
